data.message: There has been an issue lately, a few days ago it did it, then it was fixed, and now it is bad again. Whomever is being a developer at the time has been removing the "keep me logged in," option and making us manually signout whereas usually we could just click the close button and it would sign us off, but it keeps us signed in. A day ago it was fixed, 3 days ago it first occurred and now it is doing it again.
